text: Jean-Paul Charié (25 April 1952, Égry - 3 November 2009http://www.lepoint.fr/actualites-politique/2009-11-04/loiret-le-depute- ump-jean-paul-charie-est-mort/917/0/391557) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the 5th constituency in the Loiret department from 1988 to 2009, and was a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. When he died, he was succeeded by Marianne Dubois. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2009 deaths Category:People from Loiret Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Jean-Paul Charié
